title.rendered: VIDEO: Aventador S Roadster Launch at IIMS 2018

content.rendered:
Prestige Motorcars had the opportunity to launch the newest member of the Lamborghini Aventador family – the Aventador S Roadster. It was held on the opening day of the annual Indonesia International Motor Show. We were elated to see the number of media and public who turned up so witness the launch of our special new star.
